productDetails.onlyClients: Only customers who have purchased this product can leave a review.

about.historyText1: Ale Beauty Art was born in 2023 from a passion for authentic beauty and the desire to offer high-quality cosmetic products that enhance each person's natural beauty. From our humble beginnings as a small physical store, we have grown to become your reliable destination for cosmetics online.
about.historyText2: We combine traditional knowledge with the latest innovations in personal care to provide you with a comprehensive and personalized beauty experience.
about.missionText: To provide our customers with high-quality products that enhance their natural beauty and allow them to feel confident and radiant. We offer an exceptional shopping experience with a focus on customer satisfaction, authenticity, and constant innovation.
about.visionText: To be the leading beauty destination online, recognized for our quality, variety, and exceptional service. We aspire to empower each person to express their unique beauty through products that care for both their appearance and well-being.
about.makeupDescription: From foundations to lipsticks, everything to create perfect looks
about.hairDescription: Professional products for all hair types
about.qualityText: We rigorously select each product to ensure excellence and durability
about.authenticityText: All our products are 100% original with authenticity certificates
about.innovationText: Always at the forefront of the latest beauty trends and technologies
about.communityText: We believe beauty is diverse and we promote inclusion for all
about.storeTitle: We Also Have a Physical Store
about.storeDescription: In addition to our online store, we have a cozy physical location where you can experience the products personally, receive specialized advice from our team, and enjoy a unique shopping experience.
about.ctaTitle: Join the Ale Beauty Art Community
about.ctaDescription: Discover the beauty within you with products that really work

intro.part2: By accessing and using our online store for beauty products, hair care, makeup and facial care, you agree to comply with the following terms and conditions. We recommend that you read them carefully before making a purchase.

section1.title: Introduction
section1.text: These Terms and Conditions govern the use of Ale Beauty Art websites, mobile applications and services. By accessing or using our services, you agree to be bound by these terms in their entirety.

section2.title: Copyright
section2.text: All content on Ale Beauty Art, including texts, graphics, logos, images, videos and software, is the exclusive property of Ale Beauty Art and is protected by Colombian and international copyright laws.
section2.text2: Reproduction, distribution or modification without prior written authorization is prohibited.

section3.title: Trademarks
section3.text: The trademarks 'Ale Beauty Art', related logos and trade names are registered trademarks owned by Ale Beauty Art. All other trademarks are property of their respective owners.

section4.title: Product Information
section4.text: We offer beauty products, hair care, makeup and facial care. Images are illustrative and may vary slightly from the actual product. We recommend carefully reading descriptions and specifications before purchasing.

section5.title: Color Information
section5.text: Product colors may vary depending on your screen settings, device or viewing conditions. We do not guarantee exact color representation on all devices.

section6.title: Responsibility for Your Content
section6.text: You are responsible for all content you post on our platforms, including reviews, comments and photographs. Ale Beauty Art reserves the right to remove inappropriate, offensive or policy-violating content.

section7.title: Your Use of Content on Sites and Limitation of Liability
section7.text: Ale Beauty Art content is provided 'as is'. We do not guarantee the accuracy or completeness of information. Use of the site and products is at your own risk.

section8.title: Your Content Submissions
section8.text: By submitting content to our platforms, you grant us a non-exclusive license to use, modify and display such content for commercial and promotional purposes.

section9.title: Ratings and Reviews
section9.text: We encourage honest and constructive reviews. We reserve the right to remove false, promotional, offensive or non-compliant reviews.

section10.title: Content Posted on Social Media Channels
section10.text: Content tagged with #AleBeautyArt or mentioning us on social media may be shared on our official platforms, giving credit to the original creator.

section11.title: Ale Beauty Art Community
section11.text: We promote a respectful community. Any harassment, discrimination or spam behavior will result in immediate account suspension.

section12.title: Third-Party Content and Third-Party Sites
section12.text: We are not responsible for content, policies or practices of third-party websites linked from our platform.

section13.title: Mobile Services
section13.text: Our mobile app is available for iOS and Android. Mobile data usage may incur charges according to your plan. The app requires internet connection to function properly.

section14.title: Content Modification
section14.text: We reserve the right to modify, update or remove content at any time without prior notice.

section15.title: Reservation of Rights
section15.text: Ale Beauty Art reserves all rights not expressly granted in these terms. We may modify these terms at any time.

section16.title: Disclaimer of Warranties
section16.text: Products are sold 'as is'. We do not guarantee specific results as these may vary according to skin type, hair type or individual product use.

section17.title: Limitation of Liability
section17.text: Ale Beauty Art shall not be liable for indirect, incidental or consequential damages resulting from use or inability to use our products or services.

section18.title: Indemnification
section18.text: You agree to indemnify and hold harmless Ale Beauty Art from any claims arising from breach of these terms or improper use of our services.

section19.title: DMCA
section19.text: We respect intellectual property rights. To report infringements, contact our designated agent at contacto@alebeautyart.com

section20.title: Fraud Protection Program
section20.text: We implement security measures to detect and prevent fraud. Suspicious transactions may be investigated and canceled to protect our customers.

section21.title: Privacy
section21.text: We only collect name, surname, address and email. We guarantee data security through encryption protocols and do not share your information with third parties without your consent.

section22.title: Waiver
section22.text: Ale Beauty Art's failure to enforce any provision of these terms shall not constitute a waiver of such right in the future.

section23.title: Spanish Language
section23.text: These terms are written in Spanish. In case of discrepancy with versions in other languages, the Spanish version shall prevail.

section24.title: Dispute Resolution
section24.text: Any dispute will be resolved through direct negotiation. If no solution is reached, it will be submitted to the courts of Barranquilla, Colombia.

section25.title: Legal Disputes; Class Action Waiver; Jury Trial Waiver
section25.text: You waive participation in class actions and agree to resolve disputes individually. In permitted jurisdictions, you waive the right to jury trial.

section26.title: Choice of Law/Forum Selection
section26.text: These terms are governed by the laws of the Republic of Colombia. The exclusive forum for any dispute shall be the city of Barranquilla, Colombia.

section27.title: Notice to Colombian Consumers
section27.text: In accordance with the Colombian Consumer Statute, you have the right to claim for defective products. We only accept returns of sealed and unused products. To exercise your rights, contact
